title: Game Client not working
body: I can get into champ select and pick my champ/runes and what not however once the game starts the game client does not come up and all i can do is spam the reconnect button. Internet is working fine however i think this is an issue with SOPHOS anti-virus in which i cant do anything. PLEASE HELP

replies.body: I am having the same issue but only on one of my computers. I don't run any antivirus.
